title: SYLVANIA 3157 Long Life Miniature Bulb, (Contains 2 Bulbs)
description: The SYLVANIA Long Life Mini Bulb brings increased bulb life to various automotive lighting applications. These lamps have been engineered to withstand a sizeable amount of road shock and vibration. They are also constructed with a robust filament and proprietary gas mixture that results in much longer life. SYLVANIA lamps are designed to be durable, lower maintenance, and provide greater safety.
